Detailed Description

Purpose: To manage user parameters in materials.

File: GrMaterialUserParams.h Author: Kevin Bray Created: 01-04-07 Copyright © 2004 Bootstrap Studios. All rights reserved. project includes. class GrMaterialUserParams

Member Function Documentation

unsigned int GrMaterialUserParams::AddUserParam ( const char *  paramName,
URef< UExprTerm > *  values 
)

adds user parameters.

make sure a shader has been assigned.

if the parameter has already been added, simply set it's value.

get the handle from the shader. Assign a new handle if none exists.

return the index the user param was added at and then increment _userParamCount.

Definition at line 89 of file GrMaterialUserParams.cpp.

unsigned int GrMaterialUserParams::AddUserSampler ( const char *  samplerName,
const GrTextureStage &  texture 
)

adds user samplers.

make sure a valid texture was passed in.

if the sampler has already been added, simply set it's value.

if too many samplers are set, return ~0.

determine what texture unit to use.

fill out the user sampler info.

bind the user sampler in the shader.

return the index the user param was added at and then increment _userParamCount.

Definition at line 168 of file GrMaterialUserParams.cpp.

void GrMaterialUserParams::ApplyUserParams (  )  const

applies user params/samplers.

simply return if no shader is attached.

go through all user params and update the shader.

send the current param to the shader.

Definition at line 260 of file GrMaterialUserParams.cpp.

void GrMaterialUserParams::ApplyUserSamplers (  )  const

simply return if no shader is attached.

go through all user samplers and bind them to the correct texture unit.

send the current param to the shader.

void GrMaterialUserParams::SetShader ( URef< GrShader >  shader  ) 

rebuilds the user params.
